the game is quite short and not really much text is displayed.

also, the story line is about togetherness and it reminds me of my old days.

39472493.review: Very nice! what a heartwarming game (or digital comic). Recommended if you want to sit back and relax, the music is also calming.

39463408.review: Quite nice! It's a wordless, graphic short story, showing some charming slices of the daily lives of 3 Indonesian siblings named Banyu, Lintar, and Angin. The illustrations evoke specific places and characters in a way that makes me feel as if I've already known them. And they're places and characters I want to know. It's pleasant, sweet, and should leave you feeling peaceful and happy.

39463283.review: Little Storm is a very short yet adorable slice-of-life comic, showcasing the childhood and daily routine of three young siblings who live in a rural Indonesian settlement. It takes less than one minute to download, and about three to "flip" through. A great read if you're feeling down, would recommend to anyone with time to burn.

39455594.review:
가볍게 일러스트집을 보는 느낌입니다.

게임이나, 비주얼노벨을 생각하셨다면 기대하고 있었다면 거리가 멀다고 할 수 있습니다.



저는 조금이라도 스토리가 있는 텍스트 게임을 기대했는데,
 그것도 아니고 그저 정말 일러스트집을 보는 것 같습니다.


이런 분위기를 굉장히 좋아하기 때문에, 그림을 보고 있으면 따뜻한 기분이 들고 
이런쪽으로 공부하시는 분들께는 좋은 참고가 되리라 생각됩니다.


일러스트집을 보는거와 다른게 있다면 간단한 효과와 배경음이 흘러나오는 것 정도겠네요.
무료인점을 감안해서 한번쯤 따뜻한 분위기를 느껴보시는것도 좋을듯 합니다.



다만 게임이 아니기 때문에 천천히 본다고 해도 5분안에  끝낼 수 있어서 
그 점 참고 하시길.

Очень короткая (~5 минут) и милая мини-история про двух сестер и брата, проживающих независимую жизнь в Индонезии.

[/list]

[h1]Written by Aqwat.[/h1]

39313794.review:
一个短小的连环画，没有文字，只有温馨的画面和轻快的音乐。

讲述的是在乡村留守的兄妹三人，将自己的生活写给在远在城市打工的父母。

只是试验性的作品，算上封面也只有35页，真的很短，但是每一张画都很喜欢，可能是想到了自己已逝去的童年吧。

[ENG] Probably the shortest game ever created (as far as i know). Funny that viewing game's screenshots from Steam it's technically getting spoilered for most of the "game", LOL. But still, perfect music for this kind of style, and enjoyed the drawing :)
(Writing this short review took more time than completing this title, lmao. So short that i had to "play" it again in order to publish this review, since you have to play at least 5 mins).

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

[ITA] Probabilmente il gioco più corto che abbia mai visto. Divertente il fatto che guardando gli screenshot del gioco dalla pagina del negozio di Steam, è effettivamente spoiler per quasi tutto il gioco ahahaha. In ogni caso, la musica è perfetta per questo stile di gioco, e mi sono piaciuti molto i disegni nella loro semplicità :)
(Nello scrivere questa recensione ho impiegato più tempo che nel completare il gioco, lol...Così breve che ho dovuto addirittura riaprire il gioco per "giocarlo" almeno 5 minuti o non avrei potuto pubblicare questa recensione).

39294883.review:
Here's an odd review:
I was in a motorcycle accident in Indonesia just over two years ago now that should have taken my life, but didn't because I'm lucky. It happened on my third day in the country, traveling to visit a friend teaching in remote, rural northern Bali. I have not had the best feelings about the place since the accident. This picture book really helped remind me of the shared universal humanity consistent across all cultures, the culture of Indonesia being no different, and helped give me futher appreciation for a place I really only got to experience very briefly. Thank you. <3

Banyu Lintar Angin - Little Storm -

10 na 10

39293997.review:
Первое и самое главное: это НЕ ИГРА и даже не визуальная новелла в привычном смысле, как и другая работа Mojiken Studio — [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/744810/A_Raven_Monologue/]A Raven Monologue[/url]. Безусловно, творческие вложения автора заслуживают огромного уважения: всё сделано с душой, стильно и ванильно прорисованно, но, вопрос, насколько банальное слайдшоу из артов уместно среди игрового контента, в каталоге игровой платформы, остается открытым. Да, нам тут в Steam за прошедший год завезли сотни аниму с эччи и «Лордов Салема» Роба Зомби с «Посталом» Уве Болла, но(!), чёрт возьми, это просто слайдшоу, которому место на Behance или Dribble, но Steam не место для самопрезентаций иллюстраторов, каким бы удобным и заманчивым этот путь не казался.

Мне очень понравились иллюстрации, но я ожидал хотя бы новеллу, ведь проект даже находится в подкатегории «Казуальные игры», а поэтому — отрицательный отзыв. Отрицательный отзыв не творческой составляющей, с ней всё отлично, спасибо автору за его работу — отрицательный отзыв избранному пути, ведь в Steam и так слишком много контента, который с ну ооооочень большой натяжкой можно хотябы косвенно назвать «игровым», а тут ну просто слайдшоу из артов.

После этих кадров тянет пересмотреть в очередной раз «Мёд и клевер», чтобы хоть как-то придать целостности произошедшему. И, да, это скорее именно «происшествие», чем «игра» или «новелла».

Awesome work, awesome art, but not for Steam, honestly. Thank you, and good luck!

39273195.review:
该评测同步于[url=https://cowlevel.net/game/Banyu_Lintar_Angin_Little_Storm/review/2949237]奶牛关[/url]。
带音乐的幻灯片，流程很短，谈不上什么游戏时长了（与其说是游戏，不如说是有声连环画了）。
34张图片，展示的是一家三人的日常，像是在小镇里的生活，关系很和睦、惬意，从游戏中是看不出来有家长里短那种不愉快（但是实际肯定也会有吧）。
很喜欢这个，感觉比很多日本动画卖的“废萌”要好多了，更真实，代入感还是有的。总觉得日本动画里的家长里短都太夸张了。
最喜欢的是三人一起去电影院都哭成傻子的那页，三个人三种姿势，憋着不出声，好喜感哈哈哈，也很真实。
不知道这一系列实验性作品之后会是什么，很期待。
可以下载下来就当小时候看过的连环画一样看看，图片都很美~
[quote=Heuster]Short, yet satisfying.[/quote]
我也想要这样的哥哥/姐姐/妹妹！超羡慕！

39272918.review:
"For those who long for a simple togetherness with family and also those who are grateful for the togetherness they have"

The game honestly has a great review for itself in the first few seconds. This game hits one of those feel good chords you just need struck occasionally. It's short, sweet, and aesthitically pleasing. The leaves swaying through the wind is calming and beautiful. A no dialouge glimpse into a family life that will make you reflect on a few moments of your own experiences. Looking forward to more like this in the future. Check out the deluxe edition on steam which comes with some nice content including a short soundtrack and can go towards helping the developer/publishers out.

39272381.review:
游戏，额，就算他是个游戏吧。其实是个ppt。

手快的话几秒钟，手慢的5分钟足够。

看到姐姐嘴里叼跟葱那里本来想F12截张图，结果弹出来网页属性界面。

这或许是除了上次那个阿拉伯语解谜游戏，出bug之后会开始自检以外，我见过的比较奇葩的游戏之一了。

剧情是兄姐妹三人的乡村日常，父母在外打工，三人留守。背景是[strike]日本[/strike]印度尼西亚的乡下，温馨惬意，温情暖暖。
就不做对比了，家人团聚，感情和睦比什么都好。

基于是免费游戏，总体感觉还不错，花上几分钟的时间点点看看，挺好。

39515638.review:
なんとインドネシア産。
亜ゲーもついにインドネシアからも発進ですか。

内容はイラスト集で、ストーリーやゲーム性は無い。

インドネシアの農村で暮らす三人の兄妹達の日常の1コマを絵にして綴ったもの。
画風は特にクセもなく、日本人でも違和感なく受け入れられるだろう。

とても明るい雰囲気で癒し系とも取れる内容だが、
子供達だけで独立して生活している姿は、
素直にほのぼのとは思えない、
なんかお国の事情を想像しちゃうなー、と。
考えてしまうのでした。

まあ、いい家住んで何不自由のない生活をしている姿は
インドネシアにおける理想を描いたものではないかと
また考えてしまうのでした。

いつかゲームでの参加をと
意欲が見える一本ではないでしょうか。

39590410.review:
Небольшая экспериментальная бессловесная история о повседневной жизни  детей в сельских районах Индонезии. 
Banyu Lintar Angin отличается мягкой акварельной рисовкой, в которой отсутствуют прямые линии.
Это придает семейной истории соответствующий уют. 
Душевная мини-история, прекрасные иллюстрации и приятная мелодия. 
Несколько минут абсолютного релакса ~

39564285.review:
„For those who are grateful for the togetherness they have”

Banyu Lintar Angin - Litle Storm - made me smile from the beginning to the end.

Yes, this little slice of life interactional book consists of only ~30 images, but in my opinion it has the perfect length for the story it wants to tell.

I definitely don't want to spoil anything, but I totally sympathize with the characters and the story in general.

Also, I really enjoyed the backgroundmusic and the artstyle.  

I highly recommend reading this, it's free on Steam, pick it up, give it a positive feedback if you liked it so we can hope to see more of them!

40915295.review:
[b] Too cute! [/b]

A very cute short story showcasing how days will normally go for three siblings. Told by illustrations, each drawing is beautifully drawn as leaves flutter down. As well as upbeat music that perfectly matches what this story display playing throughout. Certainly brings memories of the good times hanging with your siblings, or if you don’t have any, at least hanging out with friends and all the fond memories you hold from your childhood. 

With it being completely free and only taking up a couple minutes, nothing is stopping you from picking this up!

40524961.review:
4 out of 5 ☆☆☆☆☆!

[h1] A very very short and sweet illustration 	[/h1]
Banyu Lintar Angin - Little Storm tells the tale of three unique siblings who share their time together as a family. This reminds me a lot of my childhood where [I still do] I would eat dinner together with my parents and my siblings. I personally have a bigger family than the family in this story do, but the concept is the same. We go shoppong together, we go to the park together, and we basically do everything together. 

[i]"There's no place like home"[/i]

[h1](´｡• ᵕ •｡`) ♡ -- What I Loved Best[/h1]
+ The illustrations are simple, sweet, and warm
+ Brings a lot of remininsce in my life
+ Heartwarming 
+ The music is a beautiful melody [my lack of descriptive words xD]

[h1]٩(｡•́‿•̀｡)۶ -- What Was Ohkay[/h1]
+ I just wished it could've been longer :P

[h1](⇀‸↼‶) -- What Could've Been Better[/h1]

Overall, yes of course I would recommend this short storybook. Some things cannot be said through words, but portrayed through art.

Thanks Dimas Novan D.

40233949.review:
Decided to play out of impulse from a friends' library, it was <300MB and was free so I gave it a shot.

Banyu, Lintar, and Angin are three siblings who feature in this short and sweet slice-o-life comic mini series taking place in an Indonesian environment. There are just over thirty short illustrations of the three siblings somewhere in their everyday life, it's very calming and relaxing, especially with the addition of the soothing music in the background.

The moral of these illustrations is really to appreciate what family you have, and to find happiness inside the simplicity that you as a person, live by. For a small tidbit of a visual novel, it's touching and takes no more than five minutes to take in.

40145477.review:
Sweet and short, Banyu Lintar Angin - Little Storm - brings the story of three siblings, showing their daily routine with a set of beautifully drawn images together with a really pleasant soundtrack. 

It doesn't fail in giving the player the feelings of peace and happiness, being a wholesome experience in general. The story deserves a 10 out of 10, delivering exactly what it proposes and since it's free, it is definitely worth a shot.

Посвятить этому проекту минут ~5, посмотреть красивые илюстрации художников, о жизни трех ребят, брата и двух сестер, которые проживают в Индонезии. Илюстрадии показывают повседневную жизнь ребят, из досуг, рутину и все это сопровождается незатейлевым саундтреком.

39941164.review:
It's not big, it's less than 150MB, It's defenitely not long either, probably just a length of a song if you look through everything quickly enough. But you'll get something within that time. 

Maybe an old memories that came back to you after these long long years.

Maybe an experience that you get because it's a different life or background for you.

Maybe some warmness on your heart or your soul.

Maybe some pains, scars or regrets from the past  that you no longer want to mention.

Or maybe you just felt the illustrations look pretty okay.

Who knows, everyone's different. But I'm glad that I found some joy in this experimental game and I hope you can find something good too.

P.S. It's wrong to complain the length, they didn't charge you anything.

39932729.review: Cerita singkat tentang kebersamaan. So heartwarming, made me smile throughout the story <3 Getting attached to them already lol

[spoiler]但也许是笔者比较负面，想起了某个强大国家的角落里还有那么不小的一群留守儿童（和外来务工子弟），他们的父母则在帝国的各个重镇被当作低端人口，他们则（从比例上）缺少（真正意义上的）关爱。行政机关那些作秀般的”关心“可并不能弥补家庭教育和学校教育的缺失，也许有志的游戏粉丝可以建立个NGO帮助各国的留守儿童（大概并不会）？[/spoiler]

39900421.review:
This kinetic set of illustrations puts a wide grin on my face.
It reminds me of many good memories from my childhood that I have long forgotten, and for that I'm truly grateful.

Banyu Lintar Angin - Little Storm - tells the story of three siblings going about their daily lives. Doing chores, playing together, things like that. There isn't any text involved - just pictures, accompanied by a single light-hearted music that fits really well. The art is simple in style, but they express things clearly, and have lots of details. I had fun staring at all the small things you can find in the illustrations.

The story is short, but sweet. If you have a few minutes to spare, please give this a try.

39825932.review:
I never saw that kind of game.

It isn't a pure Visual Novel, came from extremely exotic Indonesia, have one tune in the soundtrack, is based mostly on pictures with minimalistic interaction - and only two of them contains any text! The story is very nice, art is similar to Manga, Manhua, & Manhwa.

That was truly relaxing and kind experience.

In fact, this game convinced me to do two things:
1. to research if southern Asia (Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore) has its own version of "manga",
2. to watching some Indonesian movie (especially drama or slice of life), to explore that culture.

39819441.review:
Positives: Banyu Lintar Angin was free and the illustrations were cute.

Negatives: It took me two minutes two minutes to flip through all the illustrations. I felt this would have benefitted from some narration or story beyond what was inferred in the pictures.

I'll recommend it because it was free. If you like cute illustrations and perky music you may enjoy it, but it wasn't my cup of tea.

39671541.review: 最开始听到bgm的时候，我就明白这PPT...额..我是说游戏，这游戏是符合我胃口的。没有日式cg那么精致，但这画风又能恰好展现三兄妹的温馨日常。也许和我自己曾经也是留守儿童有很大的关系吧，这游戏对我来说感触挺深的。最后三兄妹守电话的场景，和自己小时候每周周末守着电话期待着和父母聊天扯地（主要是阿母，老爸话不多）的情形天打雷劈的合拍。我想假如当时我能想到画点自己日常记录的连环画之类的，他们也大概能和Banyu Lintar Angin的父母一样感到由衷的幸福和快乐吧...
